text:
/lozenge6 If the cord is bleeding, re-tie it more tightly. 
/lozenge6 Do not apply any substance to the stump. 
/lozenge6 Leave the stump uncovered and dry.
/circle6 Wipe off   any meconium or blood from the baby’s skin.
/circle6 Encourage breastfeeding within an hour of birth. 
/lozenge6 Emphasise the importance of colostrum, which helps to protect the baby against 
infections.
/lozenge6 Check if the baby’s position and his/her attachment to the breast are correct at 
the fi rst feed.
Antenat
